title: The root schema
description: The root schema comprises the entire JSON document.

context.title: The projects context in the organisation
context.description: A logical separator or a container of projects in the naming convention

projects.title: A projects collection
projects.description: An array of projects belonging to the provided context

anyOf.title: Project elements
anyOf.description: A list of elements describing the project.

name.title: The project name
name.description: A project descriptive name as used in organisation

consumers.title: The consumers schema
consumers.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

anyOf.title: The first anyOf schema
anyOf.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

principal.title: Principal name
principal.description: A Principal/User name in the form of User:Foo or Group:Bar.

group.title: Consumer Group name
group.description: An optional consumer group name given to the consumer.
